Code

  • Get code of the given placement

Get code of the given placement

GET /networks/advertisers/campaigns/placements/:placement_id/codes

Parameters

NO Parameters

Response

Status: 200 OK
X-RateLimit-Limit: 5000
X-RateLimit-Remaining: 4999
